greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sum of smallest and largest prime factors of n, for n>1; a(1)=2.
comment: If n is prime, a(n) = 2n; the only prime factor, n itself, is taken as both the "smallest" and "largest" prime factor of n. - _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Jan 14 2015
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 2, my(f=factor(n)); f[1,1] + f[#f~,1]); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 14 2015
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Sep 26 2002
